attributes.action: Promote international agreement as to base level populations for any future agreeements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sadly Copenhagen was a disaster and maybe attempted to achieve too much.  It is obvious and understandable that population is a thorny issue however perhaps an agreeement that any future allowances for resources eg GHG emissions limits be based on 2009 population levels.  This would have a tendency at least to encourage nations to stabilise populations and indeed create incentives to reduce populations in the long run.
